query:
SELECT u.id as userId, u.name, u.email, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_accounts a WHERE a.userId = u.id) as accountCount,
       (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.id) FROM ad_accounts a WHERE a.userId = u.id) as accountIds
FROM users u
WHERE u.email IN ('vip@mucers.com', 'mcoceanyet@gmail.com');
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute SELECT u.id as userId, u.name, u.email, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_accounts a WHERE a.userId = u.id) as accountCount,
       (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.id) FROM ad_accounts a WHERE a.userId = u.id) as accountIds
FROM users u
WHERE u.email IN ('vip@mucers.com', 'mcoceanyet@gmail.com');
